text: Pietro Perconti (born September 7, 1968 in Milan) is an Italian philosopher. Currently 'Professor of Philosophy and Theory of Languages' at the Department of Cognitive Sciences, University of Messina. He has written books and texts on cognition and language (representational symbology). He has tried to define common sense.
